verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees זְכוֹר־ <S%H2142><s%> ze-chor- remember יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; David אֵ֝ת <S%H854><s%> 'et behalf כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6031><s%> un-no-To. [and] all his afflictions

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher How נִ֭שְׁבַּע <S%H7650><s%> Nish-ba' How he sware לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD נָ֝דַ֗ר <S%H5087><s%> na-Dar, [and] vowed לַאֲבִ֥יר <S%H46><s%> la-'a-Vir unto the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. [God] of Jacob

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Surely אָ֭בֹא <S%H935><s%> 'A-vo Surely I will not come בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel into the tabernacle בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti; of my house אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Nor אֶ֝עֱלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-Leh, nor go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and עֶ֥רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> 'E-res bed יְצוּעָֽי׃ <S%H3326><s%> ye-tzu-'Ai. bed

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- I will not אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I will not give שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8153><s%> she-Nat sleep לְעֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nai; to mine eyes לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י <S%H6079><s%> le-'af-'ap-Pai to mine eyelids תְּנוּמָֽה׃ <S%H8572><s%> te-nu-Mah. [or] slumber

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Until אֶמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> 'em-Tza Until I find out מָ֭קוֹם <S%H4725><s%> Ma-kom a place לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; for the LORD מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת <S%H4908><s%> mish-ka-Not, an habitation לַאֲבִ֥יר <S%H46><s%> la-'a-Vir for the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. [God] of Jacob

הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold שְׁמַֽעֲנ֥וּהָ <S%H8085><s%> she-ma-'a-Nu-ha Lo we heard בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-tah; of it at Ephratah מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-Nu-ha, we found בִּשְׂדֵי־ <S%H7704><s%> bis-dei- it in the fields יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar. of the wood

נָב֥וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> na-Vo-'ah We will go לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו <S%H4908><s%> le-mish-ke-no-Tav; into his tabernacles נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <S%H7812><s%> nish-ta-cha-Veh, we will worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <S%H1916><s%> la-ha-Dom stool רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav. be able to endure

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4496><s%> lim-nu-cha-Te-cha; into thy rest אַ֝תָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, You וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> va-'a-Ron thou and the ark עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Ze-cha. of thy strength

כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nei-cha Let thy priests יִלְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H3847><s%> yil-be-shu- be clothed צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek; with righteousness וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ <S%H2623><s%> va-cha-si-Dei-cha and let thy saints יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-Ne-nu. shout for joy

בַּ֭עֲבוּר <S%H5668><s%> Ba-'a-vur the sake דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David's עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; For thy servant אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> ta-Shev, sake turn not away פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4899><s%> me-shi-Che-cha. of thine anointed

נִשְׁבַּֽע־ <S%H7650><s%> nish-ba'- hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לְדָוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid unto David אֱמֶת֮ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met [in] truth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- He will not יָשׁ֪וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv he will not turn מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> mip-pe-Ri from it Of the fruit בִטְנְךָ֑ <S%H990><s%> vit-ne-Cha; of thy body אָ֝שִׁ֗ית <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit, will I set לְכִסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> le-chis-se- upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יִשְׁמְר֬וּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-me-Ru will keep בָנֶ֨יךָ׀ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nei-cha If thy children בְּרִיתִי֮ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant וְעֵדֹתִ֥י <S%H5713><s%> ve-'e-do-Ti and my testimony ז֗וֹ <S%H2090><s%> zo, I אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם <S%H3925><s%> 'a-Lam-me-Dem I shall teach גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Hem them their children עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- for evermore עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> 'Ad; forever יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-Vu, shall also sit לְכִסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> le-chis-se- upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בָחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> va-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon; Zion אִ֝וָּ֗הּ <S%H183><s%> 'iv-Vah, he hath desired לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב <S%H4186><s%> le-mo-Shav [it] for his habitation לֽוֹ׃ lo.

זֹאת־ <S%H2063><s%> zot- likewise מְנוּחָתִ֥י <S%H4496><s%> me-nu-cha-Ti This [is] my rest עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- for ever עַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> 'Ad; forever פֹּֽה־ <S%H6311><s%> poh- Here אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב <S%H3427><s%> 'e-Shev, here will I dwell כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃ <S%H183><s%> 'iv-vi-Ti-ha. for I have desired

צֵ֭ידָהּ <S%H6718><s%> Tzei-dah her provision בָּרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Rech I will abundantly אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> 'a-va-Rech; bless אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ <S%H34><s%> ev-yo-Nei-ha, her poor אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ <S%H7646><s%> 'as-Bi-a' I will satisfy לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> La-chem. with bread

וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ <S%H3548><s%> Ve-cho-ha-nei-ha her priests אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> 'al-Bish I will also clothe יֶ֑שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> Ye-sha'; with salvation וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ <S%H2623><s%> va-cha-si-Dei-ha, and her saints רַנֵּ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> ran-Nen shall shout aloud יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-Ne-nu. aloud

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There אַצְמִ֣יחַ <S%H6779><s%> 'atz-Mi-ach to bud קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> Ke-ren the horn לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David עָרַ֥כְתִּי <S%H6186><s%> 'a-Rach-ti I have ordained נֵ֝֗ר <S%H5216><s%> Ner, a lamp לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃ <S%H4899><s%> lim-shi-Chi. for mine anointed

א֭וֹיְבָיו <S%H341><s%> oy-vav His enemies אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> 'al-Bish will I clothe בֹּ֑שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> Bo-shet; with shame וְ֝עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> ve-'a-Lav, and יָצִ֥יץ <S%H6692><s%> ya-Tzitz flourish נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> niz-Ro. but upon himself shall his crown
